'''Caution in Confidence''' is a [[Character Event Wish-2]] in [[Version 4.7]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
*  2024-06-05 11:00:00 UTC+8 &mdash; 2024-06-25 17:59:00

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character {{Wish Item|Alhaitham}} will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters {{Wish Item|Sethos;Bennett;Thoma}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
